sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { BookService } from 'src/app/services/book.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-new-book', templateUrl: './new-book.component.html', styleUrls: ['./new-book.component.css'] }) export class NewBookComponent { addBookForm: FormGroup; constructor(private service: BookService, private fb: FormBuilder, private router: Router){} ngOnInIt(){ this.addBookForm = this.fb.group({ id:[Math.floor(Math.random()*1000)], title:[null, Validators.required], author:[null, Validators.required], description:[null, Validators.compose([Validators.required, Validators.minLength(30)])], rate:[null], dateStart:[null], dateRead:[null], }) } onSubmit(){ this.service.addBook(this.addBookForm.value).subscribe(data => { this.router.navigate(["/books"]); }) } }
